channel.title: Sorry guys (BETA is now up. Go to General Programming Section for Details)
channel.description:
ok so the game we just started making was not turning out so well. so insted we came up with a new idea that i personally think is way better. its kind of a secret for now, but more info will come when we are a little more developed :-] so again sorry guys but me and the T&S Game Creations team know that you wont be disappointed.
GML Programmer
Note: We will be choosing 10 beta testers when the time comes so if you are interested please state so below. We will need complete confidence that you will not give out info on the game or steal the idea before we choose.

item.title: Sorry guys (BETA is now up. Go to General Programming Section for Details)
item.dc:creator: @GML_Programmer GML Programmer
item.description:
@GML_Programmer wrote:

Beta testing is now being accepted. Look for the post in the programming section. Im gonna make it right now to give more detail.

Read full topic

item.title: Sorry guys (BETA is now up. Go to General Programming Section for Details)
item.dc:creator: @GML_Programmer GML Programmer
item.description:
@GML_Programmer wrote:

ok guys the game is almost playable. i hope the beta testers will like it. be advised graphics are low at the moment because of all the time we’ve put into the programming. so dont worry the graphics will be better later on. we just got a professional graphics man who is gonna blow you guys outta the water. beta testing will begin soon.

Read full topic

item.title: Sorry guys (BETA is now up. Go to General Programming Section for Details)
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

I’ll beta test for you. You know I won’t give out any info because I don’t talk to anyone. And you know I won’t steal the game idea as I can’t code. (I’m learning C#, but I just downloaded it, so probably won’t do anything to serious for a while). Let me know if and when i’m accepted.

Read full topic
